code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const FeatureRequest=()=>{const[feature,setFeature]=useState('');const submitFeature=()=>{axios.post('/api/feature-requests',{description:feature}).then(()=>{setFeature('');});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Feature Request"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{value:feature,onChange:e=>setFeature(e.target.value),placeholder:"Describe your feature request"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:submitFeature,children:"Submit"})]});};export default FeatureRequest;
